FuncDef: The display module-information command displays information about dynamically installed modules in the system. The display module-information command displays information about dynamically installed modules in the system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a module name.
The value is a string of 5 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies details about a loaded module.
-

Displays detailed information about the module for the next startup.
-

ExtraInfo: To view information about dynamically installed modules in the system, run the display module-information command. The information helps to monitor whether modules are successfully installed or uninstalled.
